sprites

Class Enemy

  • java.lang.Object
    • sprites.Sprite
      • sprites.Enemy

  • public class Enemy
extends Sprite
    This represents an enemy that hurts the character on contact.
    Version:
    5/6/22

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Enemy(int x, int y, int width, int height, boolean direction)
      This creates an enemy at a specified place in the coordinate grid and places it facing a certain direction.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Enemy

        public Enemy(int x,
             int y,
             int width,
             int height,
             boolean direction)
        This creates an enemy at a specified place in the coordinate grid and places it facing a certain direction.
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate of the enemy
        y - the y-coordinate of the enemy
        faceDir - the initial direction the enemy faces when spawned
        direction - the direction the enemy moves(true: vertical, false: horizontal)

    • Method Detail

      • applyWindowLimits

                              int windowHeight)
        Method for setting window limits for movement
        Parameters:
        windowWidth - max width sprite can move to
        windowHeight - max height sprite can move to

      • move

        public void move(java.util.ArrayList<Sprite> sprites)
        Sets the direction of movement of the enemy
        Parameters:
        dir - the direction of movement of the enemy
